peopleSay.name: Aida Bugg
peopleSay.desc: Life before Company was very chaotic — we got a lot of mistyped orders. So with Company,the ability to see the order directly from the customer makes it so streamlined.

peopleSay.name: Teri Dactyl
peopleSay.desc: It won’t be easy, but buying my own home has been a lifelong dream, and knowing that I will only get out of it what I put into it, I’m ready to get a little sweat on my brow and realize my dream to its fullest.

peopleSay.name: Elmer Harvy
peopleSay.desc: To buy a nice home is to buy a better way of life. To choose a better way of life is to work toward well-being, life is to work toward well-beingand isn’t well-being what’s paramount.
